titles.title: Spirit of the Living God fall afresh on me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Spirit of the living God
Fall fresh on me
Spirit of the living God
Fall fresh on me
Melt me, mold me, fill me, use me
Spirit of the living God
Fall fresh on me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Spirit of the living God
Fall fresh on us
Spirit of the living God
Fall fresh on us
Melt us, mold us, fill us, use us
Spirit of the living God
Fall fresh on us

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Holy Presence, love divine
Cast away my fear
Holy Presence, love divine
Cast away my fear
Shield me, free me, call me, lead me
Holy presence, love divine, cast out my fear
